import React,{useState}from"react";import{Link,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import"./LoginPage.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoginPage=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();// 1. 准备 form-urlencoded 格式
const formData=new URLSearchParams();formData.append("username",email);formData.append("password",password);try{// 2. 调用后端表单登录接口
const response=await fetch("http://localhost:8080/api/user/login",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/x-www-form-urlencoded"},body:formData,credentials:"include"});if(response.ok){// 3. 登录成功跳转
alert("登录成功！");navigate("/select_city");}else{// 4. 登录失败提示
alert("登录失败，检查账号或密码");}}catch(error){console.error("Login error:",error);alert("网络错误，请稍后重试");}};const handleGuestMode=()=>{navigate("/select_city");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"login-form",onSubmit:handleLogin,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"login-title",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"guestModeButton",onClick:handleGuestMode,children:"Use Guest Mode"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["New traveler\uFF1F",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/register",children:"Register Now"})]})]})});};export default LoginPage;
